statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory WHERE min_stock_threshold < current_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > min_stock_threshold
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold AND current_stock > 20
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, min_stock_threshold FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 3
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > reorder_level
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 100 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT item_id, item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory JOIN Procurement ON Inventory.item_id = Procurement.item_id WHERE order_quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%shoes%' AND current_stock BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < minimum_stock_level;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM procurement INNER JOIN inventory ON procurement.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, minimum_stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, order_status, product_name FROM procurement INNER JOIN inventory ON procurement.product_id = inventory.product_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT order_id, product_id, sum(quantity) as total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level < 50 AND product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement WHERE status IN ('pending', 'approved') ORDER BY order_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, product_id, cost FROM Procurement WHERE cost < 100;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT Order.order_id, Inventory.product_name, Orders.order_quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.id ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT Procurement.cost, Inventory.product_name, Procurement.supplier_name FROM Procurement INNER JOIN Inventory ON Procurement.product_id = Inventory.id ORDER BY Procurement.cost DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT PurchaseHistory.purchase_date, PurchaseHistory.purchase_quantity, StockAlert.alert_level FROM PurchaseHistory INNER JOIN StockAlert ON PurchaseHistory.product_id = StockAlert.product_id ORDER BY PurchaseHistory.purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
